item.title: 望月怀远
item.description:
望月怀远 张九龄

海上生明月，天涯共此時。 情人怨遙夜，竟夕起相思。 滅燭憐光滿，披衣覺露滋。 不堪盈手贈，還寢夢佳期。

Gazing at the Moon Thinking of Afar ZHANG Jiuling A bright moon rises over the sea, all over the world shares this moment. Sentimental soul complains about this long night, while yearning throughout the night. I want to feel this shiny moon and put out candlelight, after putting on a robe, I am still chilled by the dewy. What a pity that I can not hold the moonlight in hand to give it to you, I would better go back to sleep, maybe we can gather together in the dream.

身在异乡，周遭尽是不同的肤色、面孔，第一个中秋节，难免思想之情涌动。月饼太贵，没有吃上，月亮也藏在乌云中。幸而如此，感情没了泛滥的借口。
